constructHTTPXStatusMessage

public abstract HTTPXStatusMessage constructHTTPXStatusMessage(int statusCode,
                                                               java.lang.String statusMessage,
                                                               java.lang.String protocol,
                                                               java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> headers)
Constructs a new httpx status message according to type of stream (either plain or chunked input stream). Adds especially the necessary headers for the streams.

Parameters:
statusCode - - status code of message
statusMessage - - status message
protocol - - protocol to be used
headers - - headers so far (method just appends necessary headers like Content-Type to headers and does not overwrite them, the only exception is Content-Length which is deleted if stream is chunked according to RFC2616)
Returns:
HTTPXStatusMessage

constructHTTPXActionMessage

public abstract HTTPXActionMessage constructHTTPXActionMessage(java.lang.String method,
                                                               java.lang.String protocol,
                                                               java.lang.String host,
                                                               int port,
                                                               Path path,
                                                               ParameterList query,
                                                               java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> headers)
Constructs a new httpx action message according to type of stream (either plain or chunked input stream). Adds especially the necessary headers for the streams.

Parameters:
method - - POST, GET, PUT, DELETE, HEAD
protocol - - protocol to be used
host - - destination host
port - - dest port
path - - dest path
query - - dest query
headers - - headers so far (method just appends necessary headers like Content-Type to headers and does not overwrite them, the only exception is Content-Length which is deleted if stream is chunked according to RFC2616)
Returns:
HTTPXActionMessage

public int getMaxChunkSize()
